meanings.definition: Monerans: a taxonomic group that includes bacteria and cyanobacteria
meanings.sent1: Monerans are tiny organisms that can be found everywhere.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study monerans to understand their role in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The monerans threw a party in the petri dish, inviting all their bacterial friends.
meanings.sent4: In the world of microorganisms, monerans are the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, monerans look like bustling cities teeming with life.

meanings.definition: Monerans: single-celled organisms without a distinct nucleus
meanings.sent1: Monerans reproduce by dividing into two identical cells.
meanings.sent2: In the pond, monerans float freely, absorbing nutrients from their surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The monerans had a dance-off under the microscope, showing off their single-celled moves.
meanings.sent4: In a drop of water, monerans are like tiny universes with their own rules.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of monerans belies their incredible adaptability to different environments.
